name: GitHub Profile Viewer
description: A simple web project that displays GitHub user information using public APIs. Focuses on clean UI and basic API handling.

name: Social Media Landing Page
description: A responsive landing page concept inspired by social media platforms, built to practice layout, spacing, and hover effects.

name: Search UI Experiment
description: An experimental interface that mimics search behavior, focusing on accessibility, input handling, and minimalist design.

name: Video Gallery Showcase
description: A gallery-style project showcasing video thumbnails and metadata, designed to practice grid layouts and component reuse.
